about_the_game:
JOIN my DISCORD to follow the Development:


NOTE:
This game deals with HEAVY THEMES such as Severe Mental Illness, Suicide, Domestic Abuse, Torture, Sexual and Physical Abuse, and Neglect. 💔

THE PROLOGUE
No Body is a story driven, action-turn-based RPG hybrid set in the present day. This is your First Look into what I've been creating for the last 2 years!


GAMEPLAY:
Clownface is your average 17-year old boy. 
He likes anime. He plays video games. You know, the regular stuff.
He's also been haunted by a menacing presence for as long as he can remember. 

Play as Clownface, Marked, The Witch, Angel and T0B-13 and venture through The WELL, a bizarre and dangerous reality whilst making friends and destroying Anomalies. No Body is inspired by UNDERTALE, Silent Hill, and a Night In The Woods, from its hand-drawn pixel and character art, odd humor, creature, world, and puzzle design, and focus on character and story development.

Travel through a vast semi-open world as you uncover the meaning of the WELL, complete puzzling side quests, discover secrets, and delve into tones of lore! 

FEATURES:
  • Story and Character Driven Narrative!
  • Violence, abuse, murder, and revenge!
  • Original art and music!
  • Gameplay that spans multiple genres from visual novel, to turn based combat, to action combat and platforming!
  • Investigate inside and outside of the game!
  • Quirky, funny, and horrifying characters!
  • Deep lore and mysteries to solve!
  • Do side quests and solve mysteries!
  • "Zelda-like" exploration!
  • Annoy your party members!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features the telling of the main playable character's history of mental health related issues including abuse. There is also the use of profanities and curse words in character dialogue.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: This is the PROLOGUE to my story driven, turn-based-action RPG hybrid (sort of) set in the present day called No Body. Inspired by UNDERTALE, Silent Hill, and Twin Peaks, four teens and their robot friend must escape the bizarre and dangerous reality they find themselves trapped in.
